modName: Visarra - Female Orc Follower and Spouse V2-5
summary: A pretty female orc follower with a back-story who uses 1H weapons and shields, and can be married.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]A NOTE REGARDING THIS AND MY OTHER MODS: I will not be putting out any new versions of Lydia The Unburdened, Shakuntala or Visarra until I upgrade my PC sometime early next year. I will not return to Skyrim until that time (I still have Dragonborn and Falskaar to finish so I have plenty reason to return) so I can play / run in full Ultra settings. I will update with more info when available. Thank you for your use of my mods![/size][/b]


***UPDATED SEPTEMBER 20TH, 2012 TO VERSION 2.5!
YOU WILL NEED APACHII SKY HAIR OR YOUR GAME WILL CRASH!!

Still the best Orc follower on the Nexus or Steam!

***REQUIREMENTS:
V2.0+ Apachii Sky Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/


***RECOMMENDED MODS (to get Vis looking like my screenshots):
Caliente's Big Bottom Edition - Curvy
MAK's Remodeled Armors
Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod CBBE UNP ADEC

BUG FIX NOTES:

All issues regarding over-aggression on townsfolk or people you don't want Vis attacking should be fixed now.
If anyone has any other problems, post a comment and I will look into it.

QUICK-LIST FEATURES:

VERSION 2.5
+Custom Combat AI
+Bug Fixes
+Skin tone slightly reworked to be more "Orc", less "She-Hulk" due to requests
+New hairstyle, slightly wilder and longer

CORE FEATURES
+Attractive Female Orc Follower!
+Obtainable just after reaching Riverwood.
+Lore-Friendly.
+Spouse-able!
+Set for 1H weapons and shields, a true warrior.
+Level cap set to 80.
+Wearing prisoner rags, so she'll equip whatever you give her.


DETAILED FEATURES:

Just across the river from Riverwood, a lone female orc paces nervously by the great waterfall. Lost and unable to return to her stronghold due to being on the run from her father, she can hear the villagers across the water, but stays hidden. Visarra was one of many of the chief's daughters, but the only one to resist the traditional orc ways. Long a thorn in her father's side, she drew the line at being given away as property to a neighboring chief to become just another one of his wives. Strong-willed and independant, she longs for adventure and battle, her bloodlust rarely sated. Deep in her heart, she longs for a true companion who will treat her with honor, with which to share her years, all the while fearing what will happen if her father should find her.

Visarra is a female orc follower who is a true warrior. One-handed weapons and shields are her choice of weapons, and she will stop at nothing to protect her allies. Loyal to her last breath, but unable to continue to live under the laws her stronghold laid down, Visarra escaped in the night and wanders Tamriel seeking a new life. Now lost outside of Riverwood, perhaps the Dovakhiin can give her what she seeks.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Try my other mods!

LYDIA THE UNBURDENED - Turn Lydia into a 7ft tall Nordic Barbarian.
@Skyrim Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20107
@Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80815442

SHAKUNTALA THE ROGUE - Beautiful high-elf companion who has no morals and no remorse. Lore-friendly and marrigable.
@SkyrimNexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24143
@Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96263422
author: SchwarzerWind
